name: StarChains
description:
This game was made in just under 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme Joined Together.

Our brainstorming got us to the idea of having a twin stick shooter, where you compel all the enemies to your side, rather than fighting them. 

Left clicking fires at the mouse which you can use to defend yourself, but will not get you any points. 

Instead, right clicking will Hypnotize the enemy to your fleet. The longer your chain, the higher your score.

We hope you like it, but even if you don't please leave a comment to help us improve.

Thanks.

WARNING! The web GL version in the browser may quickly run out of memory and throw an error. Please consider downloading the PC version if you can spare the time thanks.

Background Track: "Magenta Moon (Part II) By Line Noise,
